twists.name: Lords of War
twists.description: Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of each weapon equipped by WARLORD models (excluding VEHICLES).

twists.name: Bloodlust
twists.description: Units are eligible to charge if they are within 18" of one or more enemy units (instead of 12"), and roll 3D6 for Charge rolls.

twists.name: Night Fighting
twists.description: Each unit can only be the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

twists.name: High Octane
twists.description: Each time a unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

twists.name: Martial Pride
twists.description: BATTLELINE units can start Actions even if they Advanced, and can make ranged attacks while performing an Action.

twists.name: Ruinscape
twists.description: Each time a unit makes a Normal move or Advances, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

twists.name: Adapt or Die
twists.description: At the start of each battle round after the first, each player can change one of their selected Secondary Missions.

twists.name: Point Blank
twists.description: All ranged weapons have the Pistol ability (except weapons with the Blast ability).

twists.name: Rapid Escalation
twists.description: In the first battle round, up to 20% of your army's points can arrive from Strategic Reserves (no Deep Strike).

primaryMissions.name: Take and Hold
primaryMissions.flavor: Several strategic locations have been identified in your vicinity. Your orders are to assault these positions, secure them and hold them at any cost.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: The player whose turn it is scores 5VP for each objective marker they control (up to 15VP per turn).

primaryMissions.name: Linchpin
primaryMissions.flavor: True victory is built upon a firm foundation. If you cannot hold the centre, then all else will crumble swiftly.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: If the player whose turn it is does not control the objective marker in their deployment zone, they score 3VP for each objective marker they control.

If the player whose turn it is controls the objective marker in their deployment zone, they score 3VP for controlling that objective marker, and 5VP for each other objective marker they control (up to 15VP per turn).

primaryMissions.name: Burden of Trust
primaryMissions.flavor: The strategic prizes in this region must be guarded at all costs - a duty that falls upon a chosen few.
primaryMissions.setup: At the end of the Command phase, for each objective marker the player whose turn it is controls, they can select one unit from their army (excluding AIRCRAFT) within range of that objective marker to guard it until the start of their next turn.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: The player whose turn it is scores 4VP for each objective marker they control that is not within their deployment zone.
The opponent of the player whose turn it is scores 2VP for each of their units (excluding Battle-shocked units) that are within range of and guarding an objective marker they control.

primaryMissions.name: Terraform
primaryMissions.flavor: Victory here lies in shaping the landscape of the battlefield.

action.name: TERRAFORM
action.units: One or more units from your army, each within range of a different objective marker that is not within your deployment zone.
action.completes: End of the turn, if the unit performing this Action is still within range of the same objective marker and you control that objective marker.
action.ifCompleted: Each of those objective markers is terraformed by you. If that objective marker was terraformed by your opponent, it no longer is.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: The player whose turn it is scores 4VP for each objective marker they control (up to 12VP per turn).
Each player scores 1VP for each objective marker that is terraformed by them.

primaryMissions.name: Purge the Foe
primaryMissions.flavor: Exterminate the enemy. Show them no mercy.

conditions.condition: Each player scores 4VP if one or more enemy units were destroyed this battle round.
Each player scores 4VP if more enemy units than friendly units were destroyed this battle round.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: The player whose turn it is scores 4VP if they control one or more objective markers, and an additional 4VP if they control more objective markers than their opponent controls.

primaryMissions.name: Scorched Earth
primaryMissions.flavor: What cannot be secured must be burned to ash.

action.name: BURN OBJECTIVE
action.starts: Your Shooting phase, from the second battle round onwards.
action.units: One unit from your army within range of an objective marker that is not within your deployment zone.
action.completes: End of your opponent's next turn or the end of the battle (whichever comes first), if your unit is still within range of the same objective marker and you control that objective marker.
action.ifCompleted: That objective marker is burned and removed from the battlefield.

scoringBlocks.when: Any time a player burns an objective marker.

conditions.condition: That player scores 5VP if that objective marker was in No Man's Land, or 10VP instead if that objective marker was in their opponent's deployment zone.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: The player whose turn it is scores 5VP for each objective marker they control (up to 10VP per turn).

primaryMissions.name: Unexploded Ordnance
primaryMissions.flavor: Volatile undetonated material lies in your path. Shifting such hazards towards enemy territory could be the key to victory.
primaryMissions.setup: Start of the Battle: Each objective marker within No Man's Land becomes a Hazard objective marker.

action.name: MOVE HAZARD
action.units: One or more units from your army, each within range of a different Hazard objective marker you control.
action.completes: End of your turn, if the unit performing this Action is still within range of the same Hazard objective marker and you control that objective marker.
action.ifCompleted: You can move each of those Hazard objective markers up to 6". When doing so, that objective marker cannot end that move on top of any other objective marker or model, or inside impassable parts of terrain features.

conditions.condition: 8VP for each Hazard objective marker that is wholly within their opponent's deployment zone.
conditions.vp: 8VP per Hazard in opponent's deployment zone

conditions.condition: 5VP for each other Hazard objective marker that is wholly within 6" of their opponent's deployment zone.
conditions.vp: 5VP per Hazard within 6" of opponent's deployment zone

conditions.condition: 2VP for each other Hazard objective marker that is wholly within 12" of their opponent's deployment zone.
conditions.vp: 2VP per Hazard within 12" of opponent's deployment zone

primaryMissions.name: Hidden Supplies
primaryMissions.flavor: Reconnaissance units have uncovered a hidden cache of materiel in this war zone.
primaryMissions.setup: In the Place Objective Markers step, players must set up one additional objective marker in No Man's Land. Before setting up this new objective marker, players must first move the objective marker in the centre of the battlefield 6" directly towards one of the corners of the battlefield. Players then set up the new objective marker 6" from the centre of the battlefield towards the diagonally opposite corner.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: 5VP if they control one objective marker not within their deployment zone.
5VP if they control two objective markers not within their deployment zone.
5VP if they control more objective markers than their opponent controls.

primaryMissions.name: The Ritual
primaryMissions.flavor: Bitter foes clash in a race to finish a ritual to either sanctify or corrupt the battlefield.

action.name: THE RITUAL
action.ifCompleted: Set up one objective marker anywhere on the battlefield wholly within No Man's Land and within 1" of your unit, provided it can be set up exactly 12" from one other objective marker within No Man's Land and not within 6" of any other objective marker.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: The player whose turn it is scores 5VP for each objective marker in No Man's Land that they control (up to 15VP per turn).
conditions.vp: 5VP per No Man's Land objective (up to 15VP)

primaryMissions.name: Supply Drop
primaryMissions.flavor: Supplies are inbound. Secure the drop site.
primaryMissions.setup: Start of the Battle: Players randomly select two different objective markers within No Man's Land that are not in the centre of the battlefield; the first selected is the Alpha objective, the second selected is the Omega objective. Start of the Fourth Battle Round: The Alpha objective is removed. Start of the Fifth Battle Round: The Omega objective is removed.

scoringBlocks.when: End of the Command phase (or the end of your turn if it is the fifth battle round and you are going second).

conditions.condition: In the second and third battle rounds, 5VP for each objective marker in No Man's Land that they control.
In the fourth battle round, 8VP.
In the fifth battle round, 15VP.

secondaryMissions.name: Behind Enemy Lines
secondaryMissions.flavor: Your orders are clear: break through the enemy and cut off their escape routes.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If it is the first battle round, you can draw a new Secondary Mission card and shuffle this card back into your Secondary Mission deck.

conditions.condition: One unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) is wholly within your opponent's deployment zone.
Two or more units from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are wholly within your opponent's deployment zone.

secondaryMissions.name: Storm Hostile Objective
secondaryMissions.flavor: You must dominate the field of battle. Storm every site of tactical import and leave the foe with no place to hide.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If it is the first battle round, you can draw a new Secondary Mission card and shuffle this card back into your Secondary Mission deck.

conditions.condition: You control one or more objective markers that were controlled by your opponent at the start of the turn.
Your opponent did not control any objective markers at the start of the turn, and you control one or more objective markers that you did not control at the start of the turn.

secondaryMissions.name: Engage on All Fronts
secondaryMissions.flavor: This area is of extreme importance. You are to lead an immediate all-out assault to capture it and deny it to our enemy for good.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If one or more units from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are wholly within a table quarter, and those units are more than 6" away from the centre of the battlefield, you have a presence in that table quarter.

conditions.condition: You have a presence in two table quarters.
You have a presence in three table quarters.
You have a presence in four table quarters.

secondaryMissions.name: Establish Locus
secondaryMissions.flavor: You must guide allied forces onto the battlefield by any means necessary; this objective must be completed swiftly to pave the road to victory.

action.name: ESTABLISH LOCUS
action.completes: End of your turn, if that unit is within your opponent's deployment zone or within 6" of the centre of the battlefield.

conditions.condition: Your unit established a locus this turn and is within 6" of the centre of the battlefield.
Your unit established a locus this turn and is within your opponent's deployment zone.

secondaryMissions.name: Cleanse
secondaryMissions.flavor: Your forces have identified a series of tainted objectives in this area; these locations must be purified.

action.name: CLEANSE
action.units: One or more units from your army within range of an objective marker that is not within your deployment zone.
action.completes: End of your turn, if the unit performing this Action is still within range of the same objective marker and you control that objective marker.
action.ifCompleted: That objective marker is cleansed by your army.

conditions.condition: One objective marker was cleansed by your army this turn.
Two or more objective markers were cleansed by your army this turn.

secondaryMissions.name: Assassination
secondaryMissions.flavor: The enemy looks to their champions for courage. You must identify and eliminate such targets with extreme prejudice.

conditions.condition: Each time an enemy CHARACTER model with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or higher is destroyed.
Each time an enemy CHARACTER model with a Wounds characteristic of less than 4 is destroyed.
One or more enemy CHARACTER models were destroyed this turn.
All enemy CHARACTER models have been destroyed during the battle.

secondaryMissions.name: No Prisoners
secondaryMissions.flavor: Show no mercy. Exterminate your enemies.

conditions.condition: Each time an enemy Bodyguard unit or enemy non-CHARACTER unit is destroyed.
Each time an enemy unit is destroyed.

secondaryMissions.name: Cull the Horde
secondaryMissions.flavor: The enemy come forth in teeming masses. Their ranks must be thinned if the day is to be won.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If there are no enemy units on the battlefield that satisfy the condition below, you can discard this card and draw a new Secondary Mission card.

conditions.condition: Each time an enemy INFANTRY unit with a Starting Strength of 13+ (including Attached units) is destroyed.
One or more enemy INFANTRY units with a Starting Strength of 13+ (including Attached units) were destroyed this turn.

secondaryMissions.name: Bring It Down
secondaryMissions.flavor: The opposing army contains numerous heavily armoured units. You must prioritise their destruction.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If there are no enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE units on the battlefield, you can discard this card and draw a new Secondary Mission card.

conditions.condition: Each time an enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit is destroyed.
The total of the Wounds characteristics of the models in that destroyed unit was 15+ (at its Starting Strength).
The total of the Wounds characteristics of the models in that destroyed unit was 20+ (at its Starting Strength).
One or more enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE units were destroyed this turn.

secondaryMissions.name: Defend Stronghold
secondaryMissions.flavor: You are charged with the defence of a critical objective. It must not be permitted to fall into enemy hands.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If it is the first battle round, draw a new Secondary Mission card and shuffle this card back into your Secondary Mission deck.

scoringBlocks.when: End of your opponent's turn or the end of the battle (whichever comes first).

conditions.condition: You control one or more objective markers in your deployment zone.

secondaryMissions.name: Marked for Death
secondaryMissions.flavor: You have been ordered to eliminate specific enemy assets to ensure victory, no matter how insignificant they may seem.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: Your opponent must select three units from their army on the battlefield. If there are only one or two units from their army on the battlefield, they must select those units. The selected units are your Alpha Target units. You can then select one unit from your opponent's army on the battlefield to be your Gamma Target unit. If there are no units from their army on the battlefield, discard this card and draw a new Secondary Mission card.

conditions.condition: One or more of your Alpha Target units were destroyed (or removed from the battlefield for any other reason) this turn.

None of your Alpha Target units were destroyed (or removed from the battlefield for any other reason) this turn, but your Gamma Target unit was destroyed (or removed from the battlefield for any other reason) this turn.

secondaryMissions.name: Secure No Man's Land
secondaryMissions.flavor: You must advance swiftly into no man's land and seize it before the enemy can, lest they take control of the entire battlefield.

conditions.condition: You control one objective marker in No Man's Land.
You control two or more objective markers in No Man's Land.

secondaryMissions.name: Sabotage
secondaryMissions.flavor: This region is replete with strategic assets or supply caches vital to your foe. See to it that they are reduced to just so much flaming wreckage.

action.name: SABOTAGE
action.units: One unit from your army that is within a terrain feature and not within your deployment zone.
action.completes: End of your opponent's next turn or the end of the battle (whichever comes first), if your unit is on the battlefield.

scoringBlocks.when: End of your opponent's turn or the end of the battle (whichever comes first).

conditions.condition: Your unit committed sabotage this turn and is not within your opponent's deployment zone.
Your unit committed sabotage this turn and is within your opponent's deployment zone.

secondaryMissions.name: Area Denial
secondaryMissions.flavor: It is critical that this area is dominated. No enemy vanguard or guerrilla units can be allowed to disrupt your plans.

conditions.condition: One or more units from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are within 3" of the centre of the battlefield, and there are no enemy units within 3" of the centre of the battlefield.
One or more units from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are within 3" of the centre of the battlefield, and there are no enemy units within 6" of the centre of the battlefield.

secondaryMissions.name: Recover Assets
secondaryMissions.flavor: You must locate and reclaim scattered strategic assets.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If you are playing an Incursion mission, or if there are fewer than three units from your army on the battlefield, you can discard this card and draw a new Secondary Mission card.

action.name: RECOVER ASSETS
action.units: Two or more units from your army, if each of those units is wholly within a different one of the following areas: your deployment zone; No Man's Land; your opponent's deployment zone.
action.completes: End of your turn, if either two or three of those units are on the battlefield.

scoringBlocks.when: End of your turn or the end of the battle (whichever comes first).

conditions.condition: Two of your units recovered assets this turn.
Three or more of your units recovered assets this turn.

secondaryMissions.name: A Tempting Target
secondaryMissions.flavor: An opportunity to seize a valuable asset has been identified, but the enemy are likely to use it as bait in a trap. Move to secure the site, but be wary of enemy ambushes.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: Your opponent must select one objective in No Man's Land to be your Tempting Target objective marker.

conditions.condition: You control your Tempting Target objective marker.

secondaryMissions.name: Extend Battle Lines
secondaryMissions.flavor: The battleground is conquered one yard at a time. Lead your forces forward and establish a strong presence in the area.

conditions.condition: You control one or more objective markers within your deployment zone and one or more objective markers within No Man's Land.
You control one or more objective markers within No Man's Land.

secondaryMissions.name: Overwhelming Force
secondaryMissions.flavor: You must scour the enemy from the face of the battlefield.

conditions.condition: Each time an enemy unit that started the turn within range of an objective marker is destroyed. Designer's Note: Destroyed Leader and Bodyguard units count separately for the purposes of scoring this Secondary Mission, provided that Attached unit started the turn within range of an objective marker.

secondaryMissions.name: Display of Might
secondaryMissions.flavor: Intimidation is the most potent of weapons. Degrade the combat abilities of your opponent to demonstrate your superiority and erode enemy morale.
secondaryMissions.whenDrawn: If it is the first battle round, draw a new Secondary Mission card and shuffle this card back into your Secondary Mission deck.

conditions.condition: There are more units from your army than from your opponent's army wholly within No Man's Land.

stratagem.name: Burst of Speed
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army (excluding units that made a move this phase) can make a Normal move of up to D6", and then cannot move again this phase.

conditions.condition: Models in two or more units from your army made one or more attacks against the same enemy unit this turn, and models in that enemy unit lost one or more wounds as a result of any of those attacks.

stratagem.name: Opportunistic Strike
stratagem.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 6" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

conditions.condition: One or more enemy models from two or more different units were destroyed this turn.

stratagem.name: Force a Breach
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

action.name: SECURE EXTRACTION ZONE
action.units: One unit from your army that is not within your deployment zone and is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.

stratagem.name: Great Haste
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase. Until the end of the phase, add D6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

conditions.condition: One or more units from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are within your opponent's deployment zone.

stratagem.name: Pivotal Moment
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army. Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

conditions.condition: One or more enemy units were destroyed this turn.

stratagem.name: Renewed Focus
stratagem.when: Your Shooting phase or your Fight phase.
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

action.name: ESTABLISH COMMS
action.units: One unit from your army that is more than 15" away from all other units from your army.

stratagem.name: Harboured Power
stratagem.when: Your Shooting phase or your Fight phase.
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability and your choice of the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

conditions.condition: For each objective marker you control.

stratagem.name: All In
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends it as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

action.name: SELF PRESERVATION
action.completes: End of your turn, if that unit is more than 18" away from all enemy units.

stratagem.name: Strategic Retreat
stratagem.effect: One unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

conditions.condition: For each of the following areas where one or more units from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are wholly within: your deployment zone, 6" of the centre of the battlefield, No Man's Land, your opponent's deployment zone. To a maximum of 1VP per unit.
